name: Dambi
description:
Similar to Toadeo and Kooliet, this is a game that I put together very quickly and held off on showing to anyone. Made in about 12 feverish hours at a Games for Diversity Jam at GDC 2014.

To the extent that there's a puzzle it's trying to figure out what you can even do and how to do it. I still think it's cute and a mildly interesting concept.

How to play:
Arrow keys to move
Spacebar to interact
